name: linkcheckerhtml
description: Alt+H checks for broken links in HTML file.  Alt+T sends currently-selected URL to browser.  Alt+M sends HTTPS version of currently-selected HTTP URL to browser.

commands.title: Open an URL in the browser
Open HTTPS equivalent of an HTTP URL in the browser

linkcheckerhtml.checkMailtoDestFormat.description: Check format of email addresses in mailto links.

linkcheckerhtml.maxParallelThreads.description: Maximum number of links to check in parallel (range is 1 to 20).

linkcheckerhtml.timeout.description: Timeout (seconds) for accessing a link (range is 5 to 30).

linkcheckerhtml.reportNonHandledSchemes.description: Report links with URI schemes not checked by the checker, such as FTP and Telnet ?

linkcheckerhtml.localRoot.description: String prepended to links that start with '/'.

linkcheckerhtml.userAgent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:66.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/66.0
linkcheckerhtml.userAgent.description: User-Agent value used in Get requests.

linkcheckerhtml.checkInternalLinks.description: Check #name links to targets inside current file.

linkcheckerhtml.processIdAttributeInAnyT.description: #name link can be to any tag with ID attribute inside current file.

linkcheckerhtml.reportHTTPSAvailable.description: Report if HTTP links have HTTPS equivalents that work ?

linkcheckerhtml.dontCheckURLsThatStartWi.description: Don't check URLs that start with any sequence in this comma-separated list.

linkcheckerhtml.addExtensionToLocalURLsW.description: If a local file URL has no extension, add this extension to the filename before checking.
